concept.title: 227.7105-3 ACQUISITION OF MODIFIED EXISTING WORKS.

conbody.p: Use the clause at 252.227-7020, Rights in Special Works, in solicitations and contracts for modified existing works in lieu of the clause at 252.227-7021, Rights in Dataâ€“Existing Works.
